Posts.Content: LilliansGirl wrote: Back in May 2012 I had my routine mamo w/ultra sound due to dense breast tisssue.  This has been routine for the past four years.  My recent visit found a small lump.  I was give a 6 month appointment for a follow up ultra sound.  First off neither my regular  DR or by OB had called me to follow up after they received the report.  6 months later I had my ultra sound no change in the size and the reports says that it is most likey no cancer.  I made calls to both DR's again and surprise no reuturn phone call.  They both know that there is a history of BC in my family am I thinking they should be ontop of this and calling me even if there is no concern.  Last time I checked I did not got to medical school nor am I any type of health care professtional.  Other than find some new dr's I would like to hear some thoughts and feed back of others that may have gone through the same type of thing. Also I like in the FFLD County area and if anyone knows of some specialist I would love some names. Thanks & God Bless LG Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Should I wait .... LilliansGirl Beesie
